title: Boxbox made over $500 in 36 minutes.
body: For all those people wondering how much streamers can make.

replies.body: some streamers make over 10K in 1 stream... so what. the majority of streamers don't get enough viewers for twitch to allow them to run ads or get a subscriber button.

Bjerg makes $40K a month for Twitch.

Makes me wanna re-think about Pro Gaming.
i really dont understand the point in this post
that's what this button is for
